com.mongodb.util

Class ThreadPool<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mongodb.util.ThreadPool<T>
  • Deprecated. 
    This class is no longer in use and should not have been public. It may be removed in a future release.

    @Deprecated
public abstract class ThreadPool<T>
extends Object
    A thread pool implementation.
